name: DigitalOcean
description: Integrate with DigitalOcean to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Droplets
tools.description: List all droplets (virtual machines) in the DigitalOcean account. Returns names, IDs, regions, sizes, and statuses.

tools.name: Create Droplet
tools.description: Create a new DigitalOcean droplet. Specify the name, region, size, and image.

tools.name: List Databases
tools.description: List all managed database clusters in the DigitalOcean account. Returns engines, versions, regions, and statuses.

tools.name: List Domains
tools.description: List all domains registered in the DigitalOcean account. Returns domain names and TTL values.

tools.name: Get Account
tools.description: Get DigitalOcean account information including email, droplet limit, team membership, and verification status.
